name: Shrimp Game (Brick Wall Games, Quissy)
description:
Welcome to Shrimp Game.

The rules are simple, collect and eat as many shrimp as possible, oh and don't die...

Use your life force to Illuminate the depths of the ocean floor and eat plenty of shrimp to maintain your energy.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Illuminate

Left Mouse Button - Dash

Credits:

Programming - https://brick-wall-games.itch.io/

Pixel art - https://quissy.itch.io/
